Katenar: His goal is to prevent the Kamael from regaining their rightful innate power. All the problems you've had stem from his efforts, in fact. Here is what he dropped when he fled. Take it -- you'll need it. Ah, I see that you're wondering whether you will achieve the same level of power I have if you release the final seal. But you already know who I am, don't you? That's not important right now, though -- this concerns more than individual power. It concerns the future of the Kamael, a future free from the artificial destinies imposed on mortals by the gods. You will be able to forge your own fate... Farewell, my friend.
